pieces so short theres room specifics So might less accord broad strokes Berrys vision theres detail back up problem tone very page reader feels like lectured at course pieces lectures theres certain condescension runs book Berry certain words such appropriate authentic adequate  are hes obviously made kind value judgment reader it end result flaws reader feels like hectoring argument made supporting logic -- ultimately smacks preaching choirWhich unfortunate tend agree Berry lot things though anti-abortion stance Small farms good agribusiness bad stewardship land good extraction industries bad treating body organic good things nature Alas tendency making sweeping assertions accusations too simplistic shrill useful examples 15 pages will suffice illustrate This world cultures preserve nature rural life will simply disallowed Communists capitalists alike contempt country people country life country places Berry succumbs trick creating straw men counter theses example essay claims conservationists people want simply preserve land pristine untouched state thats all certainly conservationists feel way small minority much larger community actually total accord Berrys views stewardship land use certainly doesnt help matters view small-scale farming appears heavily tinted rose-colored glasses claims modern agribusinesses rendered small farm economically unviable sounds like reasonable proposition However ignores fact that historically small scale farming ran thinnest margins subject kind external instability weather vermin etc operated slightly better subsistence level farming cash scarce thats people abandoned droves opportunity presented itself such WWII defense-industry factories opened California Of course Berrys vision dont really need cash barter need neighbors Berrys exhortations create small-scale communities worthy stuff even cities people creating this growth CSAs farmers markets like past decade tangible indicator this However achieve large scale results Berry seeks requires rigorous roadmap provided slim collection
